DataElement.preferredName: Disposition Domain Efficacy Concern Protocol Therapy Change  Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field which specifies reason for change in protocol therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Efficacy Concern Protocol Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._The capacity to bring about a desired effect._A matter of interest or importance._A rule which guides how an activity should be performed._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Property.preferredDefinition: The capacity to bring about a desired effect.:A matter of interest or importance.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

A matter of interest or importance.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A rule which guides how an activity should be performed._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._The words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
